--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron eyed their enthusiasm. "You see Shockwave, these are the
> idealist warriors we could have used more of on Cybertron." Megatron
> turned to Shockwave. "What is your suggestion with this 
infiltrator."
> Megatron asked pointing at the captured Slaughter, knowing 
Shockwave's
> logic was flawless.

::DOMNIJOE AND BLINDCHAOS::

    Blindchaos looked so thilled with Megatron's approval he could 
pop. Domnijoe gave him an annoyed glance, though she, too, was 
thrilled to have her commander's approval. She stood back and watched 
as Megatron spoke to Shockwave.
    Blindchaos took the femme's example and politely stood back. He 
couldn't help but find Shockwave a tad bizzare. Especially with that 
lone, blinking eye of his...The triple changer tried very hard not to 
stare.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions\
\*************************
